titleStmt.title: A certificat in order to the collecting and reporting the state of the present English free-schools.
titleStmt.author: University of Oxford.
Mews, Peter, 1619-1706.
Bouchier, T.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: P. Bath and Wells, Vice-Chancellor Oxon, T. Bouchier, Reg. Prof. of the Civll Law in Oxon, Oxon. Aug. 16, 1673.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
